text: Francine York (born Francine Yerich; August 26, 1936 - January 6, 2017) was an American movie and television actress. She was born in Aurora, Minnesota. Her career began in 1961. She was known for her role as Lydia Limpet in Batman and appeared on Death Valley Days with Ronald Reagan. She retired in 2014. York died in Van Nuys, California on January 6, 2017 from cancer, aged 80. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1936 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in California Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Minnesota
title: Francine York
